actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $825 the maximum amount of the lump-sum death payment thereunder.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Increases to $825 under title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act the maximum amount of the lump-sum death payment thereunder.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $825 the maximum amount of the lump-sum death payment thereunder.
